basics.name: Santiago Scalzadonna
basics.summary: During my 15 years of experience in software and web development, I’ve worked with several companies, from enterprise-level to startups.  Being part of teams spread over the globe I had the opportunity to learn from great people and develop soft skills like communication, mediation and negotiation. I am keen on learning from pioneers and experts in the field, and teaching what I know to my colleagues and peers.  As part of my career advancement, I’ve developed a strong LEAN based culture for product development, delivering outstanding results, always accountable to the plan, scope and quality.  Over the past years, I’ve adquired professional experience designing, building and maintaining enterprise wide large applications as well as many and webs and ecommerce sites for diverse industries such as education, transportation, IT, telecommunications and retails.  At the moment I’m integrating past experiences with an eye on latest trends, towards a post degree in Data Science, integrating data insights using statistical tools: R language and related libraries into beautiful and interactive web based data visualizations.  Last, but not least, I’m always looking forward to create and deliver value and profit for the good of people and planet earth. I had developed a passionate entrepreneurial spirit related to nature and travel, focused on the concepts of the sharing economy and green alternatives & solutions.

work.summary: Being part of YouBIM Dev Team I had the chance to work on its core product YouBIM Cloud as well as YouBIM Viewer and Integration Framework, which togheter form a BIM Facility Management system designed for large building constructors and owners.   YouBIM is an integrated database with instant access to asset information and location through an easy-to-navigate web-based 2D/3D-BIM interface.  YouBIM attaches rich data and documents [PDFs, JPGs, Excels, etc.] to smart objects within the online Building Information Model (BIM) dataset. In addition, YouBIM includes “light” Work Orders and Preventive Maintenance functionalities and it seamlessly integrates with CMMS and CAFM systems like IBM Maximo, Planon Software, ArchiBUS, Infor, etc. YouBIM can also integrate with BAS/BMS bringing live performance data to be displayed within the YouBIM environment.  The YouBIM User Interface differentiates itself from other solutions in the industry by designing the User Experience with focus on the Owner and facility staff.  Techstack: JS: Backbone, ES6, React, Redux, Typescript, WebGL Backend: PHP (Cake), Mysql/Aurora, C#, node, express. AWS: EC2/EBS/RDS/S3/VPC Build/Code Tools: gitflow, Jenkins. Artifactory Scrum Agile Methodologies

Design and development of data visualizations for ThinkCERCA.com, an online platform designed to empower teachers to personalize literacy instruction across disciplines.  Technologies: Ruby/Rails JS/Ember.js D3.js Bootstrap  About the company: ThinkCERCA is a web-based literacy program that scaffolds the development of critical thinking and argumentative writing skills for students in grades 3-12. The CERCA acronym (Claims, Evidence, Reasoning, Counterarguments, Audience) represents the site's structured approach to teaching critical thinking and argumentation, and both unpacking these elements in readings and using them in students' own writing is key to the site's learning experience.
